page.title: 03A CHILD'S VIEW
page.content: I{like life}in Westhoughton because I go horse-riding every week.In Westhoughton there are shops,a sports centre,swimming pool,dentists,pubs and clubs.On Thursdays I go to the club to play Bingo. On Saturdays I go shopping for my mum.I go in the{supermarket,the {grocers,and the discount store.}When I go home my mum gives me my{spending {money}and I go to the{sports centre} and{the swimming pool}. When my mum goes to the Commercial Inn I go up to{Wingates}to a shop called the Black and White.Next to it is the{Post Office}where I buy my pens and pencils.I go to my Gran's on{ {Chorley Road}then on my way home I cross Church Street to stroke a dog called Tim.Then I cross back,go round the corner and I get home.
